entries.name: qop
entries.desc: Quality of protection.  RFC 2617 defines “auth” and “auth-int”

entries.name: make_passwd(realm, user, pass)
entries.desc: Used by UserDB to create a digest password entry

entries.name: new(config, default=Config::DigestAuth)
entries.desc: Creates a new DigestAuth instance.  Be sure to use the same DigestAuth instance for multiple requests as it saves state between requests in order to perform authentication.

entries.name: authenticate(req, res)
entries.desc: Authenticates a req and returns a 401 Unauthorized using res if the authentication was not correct.

entries.name: challenge(req, res, stale=false)
entries.desc: Returns a challenge response which asks for authentication information
